mods.abstract: The Nashville Alumni Singers Were Organized November 1, 1947 for the Purpose of Planning Music for the Thanksgiving Program. Mrs. Henerietta Rucks-McCallister, Chairman of the Music Committee, Served as the First Chairman. The Idea of the Alumni Singers Originated With President W. S. Davis In a Committee Meeting With the Chairman of the Program Committee and the Executive Secretary. Pictured From L-R (First Row)- Prof. John H. Sharpe, Director, Mrs. Carrie M. Denney, Miss Mildred Joyner, Mrs. Sabra S. Conner, Mrs Mildred King Gaines, Miss F. Modestine Young. L-R (Second Row)- Miss Macel Smith, Mr. Eugene Caruthers, Mrs. Henrietta Rucks McCallister, Mr. William Crawley and Miss Dorothy Gentry.

titleInfo.title: Tennessee State University Library Digital Collections
